On 04/16/2009 04:58 PM, jamie_condon@... wrote:
>
>
>
> Hi there,
> I'm trying to write a program which will use Heritrix to crawl for
> semantic web documents, but I'm having difficulty understanding what
> needs to be done to properly run a crawl from Eclipse. I've downloaded
> and imported all the necessary files, and have declared an instance of
> Heritrix, and my best guess is that before you can run a crawl you have
> to pass it all the arguments that are passed to it when you run Heritrix
> through the web UI. Could anyone tell me what exactly you need to do
> before it will run a crawl and start returning pages?
> Unless I've totally misunderstood what needs to be done..
>
> Any help would be much appreciated.
>
import org.archive.crawler.Heritrix;
...
public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
	Heritrix.main(new String[]{"-a","PWD", 
"-w","HERITRIX_HOMElib/webui-VERSION.war"});
	}

replace PWD and HERITRIX_HOME according to your setup

that should do the job

best
  juergen
>
